text: Marc Goua (born March 3, 1940) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Maine-et-Loire department, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Marc Goua
